name: Salted Caramel Pudding
description: Serve with 1 tbsp berries or 1 sliced strawberry for dessert.
preparation: Combine contents of pouch with milk. Whisk or beat with a mixer on low for 2 min.
Cover and chill for 10 min before serving.
tips: Serve with 1 tbsp berries or 1 sliced strawberry for dessert.
Try with your choice of non-dairy milk. Top with fruit, layer in parfaits, or use in frozen desserts.
Salted Caramel Coffee Pudding: Replace 1 cup milk with 1 cup chilled coffee.
Salted Caramel Chocolate Pudding: Replace 1 cup milk with 1 cup chocolate milk.
